entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 09:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
